content: Yes, he's a music producer and composer, specifically his work is known for creating music for the games that are released.
I'm Vladimir. Andre Patandre is my son. He make hip hop and Electonic beats.

He's doing well. Soon he'll put stuff online. He uses GarageBand to make beats.  He's inspired by Dr. Dre.  He's only 6 and has perfect pitch.  Remember this! It's very important.
